title: 'It's shameful': Russian-linked billionaires have given enormous sums of money to the West's leading educational and cultural institutions - CNN
content:
1. 'It's shameful': Russian-linked billionaires have given enormous sums of money to the West's leading educational and cultural institutions  CNN

description: Russian billionaires have given enormous sums of money to philanthropies. Experts say it's an attempt to save their reputations.
